entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 6:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 early in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
